#summary styleSheetLinkTag(sources[type,media])
#labels api,0.9

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*

Returns a `link` tag based on the supplied arguments.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *sources* || string || true ||   || The name of a CSS file in the `stylesheets` folder ||
|| *type* || string || false || text/css || The `type` attribute for the `link` tag ||
|| *media* || string || false || all || The `media` attribute for the `link` tag ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- view code --->
<head>
  #styleSheetLinkTag("styles")#
</head>
}}}
